scripts.setup: yarn codegen && yarn create-local && yarn deploy-local
scripts.prepare:taiko: mustache config/config-taiko.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen && yarn build
scripts.create:taiko:goldsky: yarn prepare:taiko && goldsky subgraph create takotako/takotako-taiko
scripts.deploy:taiko:goldsky: yarn prepare:taiko && goldsky subgraph deploy takotako/takotako-taiko
